actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide uniform accounting of pension liabilities of tax-exempt pension funds.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require the Secretary of the Treasury to promulgate uniform standards for calculating and reporting the assets and liabilities of tax-exempt employee pension funds and for disclosing the actuarial assumptions used in such calculations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide uniform accounting of pension liabilities of tax-exempt pension funds.
